definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: The crowded continent is full of beautiful architecture and perse cultures.
sentences.chinese: 擁擠的大洲充滿美麗的建築和文化。

sentences.english: There has been some tension in my life, living and belonging on two continents.
sentences.chinese: 在兩大洲生活使得我的生命有些焦慮和緊張。

sentences.english: The world is divided into seven continents.
Before long, the SARS virus had spread to nearly every continent - and killed hundreds of people.
sentences.chinese: 不久，薩斯病毒傳播到幾乎各大洲，導致數百人死亡。

sentences.english: Spanish is an official language on four continents and is the mother tongue in 21 countries.
sentences.chinese: 西班牙語是四大洲21個國家的母語和官方語言。

sentences.english: Indeed it is—the brahminy has already colonized six continents.
sentences.chinese: 確實，正是這種慄盲蛇廣佈六大洲。

sentences.english: By 1982 AIDS had been detected on five continents
sentences.chinese: 到1982年，五大洲皆有艾滋病例報告。

sentences.english: In his spare time he has traveled to all seven continents. Follow him on Twitter @cqchoi.
sentences.chinese: 空餘時間，他足跡遍佈七大洲。

sentences.english: The Middle East is located in the junction of Europe, Asia and Africa.
sentences.chinese: 中東地處歐亞非三大洲交接處，戰略地位十分重要。

sentences.english: The world is made up of seven continents and four oceans.
sentences.chinese: 世界是由七大洲和四大洋組成的。

sentences.english: Software produced by this syndicate turned up in 36 countries on six continents.
sentences.chinese: 這個集團生產的軟件在六大洲的36個國家出現。

sentences.english: Great states like California and Illinois appear about to go belly-up. The U.
sentences.chinese: 像加利福尼亞和伊利諾斯這樣的大洲貌似快破產了。

sentences.english: The US has agreed to grant the diplomatic recognition to the new state.
sentences.chinese: 美國已經同意給予這個新大洲在外交上的承認。

sentences.english: Fiber-optic cables are the lifelines for connecting Internet users on different continents.
sentences.chinese: 光導纖維是各大洲的互聯網用戶相互聯絡的生命線。

sentences.english: DIAB has manufacturing facilities on four continents and three research and development centers.
sentences.chinese: 戴鉑在四大洲都有生產廠並在全球擁有三個研發中心。

sentences.english: Rattle is widely distributed throughout the world, five continents.
sentences.chinese: 撥浪鼓在世界各地分佈很廣，五大洲都有。

definition: America (including North, Central and South America)/the Americas/abbr. for 亞美利加洲|亚美利加洲[Ya4 mei3 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]
Europe/abbr. for 歐羅巴洲|欧罗巴洲[Ou1 luo2 ba1 Zhou1]
Africa/abbr. for 阿非利加洲[A1 fei1 li4 jia1 Zhou1]
Latin America/abbr. for 拉丁美洲
